name: Attack of the Red-Masks
description:
You wake up and your hometown is under attack by creepy enemies - you must escape to safety, fighting through the enemy forces.

A simple 2D action platformer with a bit of replayability in that you get to choose your weapons mid-way. Controls are explained as you go.

Made in collaboration with Walfalcon for Ludum Dare 45

Changelog: 08/Oct

  • Added a death trigger for when player is stuck out of bounds
  • Clarified some of the instructions
  • Moved some input keys across the keyboard to avoid key ghosting
  • Fixed aspect ratio - you'll see a lot more above and below you!
